"This is the Northern Base.": "Through our investigations, we've confirmed the presence of a control room within it..."
"We believe the terminals there will allow us to open a passage into its farthest depths."
"In addition to the DOLLS, this structure features defenses not unlike those of a fortress."
"You can expect this to be even more difficult than Dreisen Plant. You should all prepare accordingly."
"We will form our tactics around the information brought back to us by our scouting team."
"...I see. In the last battle, they must have..."
"Are there any others capable of forward reconnaissance?"
"We work in ARKS field analysis for missions based out of Central City, ma'am."
"I'm not entirely confident about my results in an environment like this, but I have the experience..."
"I manage data collection and analysis in coordinance with Central City's command room."
"Thank you. I'll leave that to you. If you notice any anomalies, report them to us immediately."
"While they gather data, I want you all to resupply."
"Our operation will resume as soon as we're done analyzing the data."
"You three, please go resupply as well. Report to me as soon as you're ready."
